messages.subject: We just had our first true unschooling moment
messages.msgSnippet: Why do males all like power tools?  lol I think people in general like power tools! I do anyway. Our society has made little girls intimidated by items like
messages.messageBody:
"Why do males all like power tools? lol"

I think people in general like power tools! I do anyway.
Our society has made little girls intimidated by items like that (in the past, still evident though) but I think most people are pretty drawn to a machine that can turn a piece of wood into a useful, interesting item. Or the way a reciprocal saw can demolish most anything...that's cool stuff!!

Ren



"I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn."
Albert Einstein
